about_the_game:
Embark on a vibrant journey like never before in the "House of Jigsaw: Amazing Colors of the World" DLC! Immerse yourself in a world bursting with brilliant hues and intricate details as you attempt to solve a captivating, highly colorful jigsaw puzzle. This DLC introduces a refreshing twist to the House of Jigsaw universe, providing a visual spectacle that will challenge your puzzle-solving skills to the max.

Unleash your inner puzzle maestro and dive into the multicolored landscapes of House of Jigsaw: Amazing Colors of the World. Explore the vivid tapestry of our planet and showcase your skills on the global stage! Get ready to experience a puzzle-solving journey like no other. Can you solve the jigsaws in the shortest amount of time? Show your results on the community page.



  • Unleash your inner puzzle maestro
  • Multiple puzzle selection
  • Cutouts up to 1000 pieces
  • Different edge cutouts
  • Change background color
  • Incredible zoom
  • Compare your time score with players on the community page
